net.cloud.server.event.command

Class CommandScriptReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.event.command.CommandScriptReader

  • public class CommandScriptReader
extends Object
    This despite its name is not a Reader, either. It will read from a command script and execute all of the commands that are detailed in the script. Like the CommandReader it is blocking in nature and will not return until all available commands have been executed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CommandReader cmdReader
      The CommandReader will handle reading from the input
      private BufferedReader in
      The input to read commands from
      private PrintWriter out
      The output to show result messages to
      private String scriptName
      Name of the command script to run

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandScriptReader(String scriptName, PrintWriter out)
      Create a new CommandScriptReader which will open the given script file and then execute all of the commands specified in the file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandScriptReader

        public CommandScriptReader(String scriptName,
                           PrintWriter out)
        Create a new CommandScriptReader which will open the given script file and then execute all of the commands specified in the file.
        Parameters:
        scriptName - The name of the command script to execute
        out - Where the results will be shown to

    • Method Detail

      • readCommands

        public void readCommands()
        Read all of the commands available from the file and run them. If the file cannot be opened, no commands will be run and an error message will be shown to the output. This will not return until all of the commands have executed.

      • initBR

        private void initBR()
             throws FileRequestException
        Obtain and initialize a BufferedReader to the command file
        Throws:
        FileRequestException - If the file could not be opened

      • closeBR

        private void closeBR()
              throws IOException
        Attempt to close the current input file
        Throws:
        IOException - If the file could not be closed

      • initCmdReader

        private void initCmdReader()
        Initialize the CommandReader which will be used to read from the input

      • messageOut

        private void messageOut(String message)
        Try to write a message to out. If it cannot be written, fails silently
        Parameters:
        message - A message to send back to the user, creator, or whatever
